title: Pope Gregory VII
summary: Pope Gregory VII (Latin: Gregorius VII; c. 1015 â€“ 25 May 1085), born Hildebrand of Sovana (Italian: Ildebrando da Soana), was head of the Catholic Church and ruler of the Papal States from 22 April 1073 to his death in 1085. He is venerated as a saint in the Catholic Church.
